name: Cantosino.com Profit Pass
description: Launched on the Canto blockchain in 2023, Cantosino is a decentralized betting protocol that offers a fair and unrestricted betting experience and unique yield farming opportunities Using Turbo Lending with Real Yield Dividends, users are able to secure predictable yields from protocol revenue. Cantosino offers a range of original and classic casino games, with plans to extend its games lobby to include Poker and other favorites. The Cantosino.com Profit Pass(CPP)is a utility token that doubles the dividends earned from lending and staking on the platform.
